title: Paul Berg, pioneer in gene splicing who led way for biotech, dies at 96
description: Dr. Berg, winner of the 1980 Nobel Prize in chemistry, was also troubled by the potential risks of gene manipulation in the early years.

title: After AI chatbot goes a bit loopy, Microsoft tightens its leash
description: The tech giant says no more long exchanges about the “feelings” of the Bing artificial intelligence chatbot.

title: Terrorists killed their daughter. Now they’re fighting Google in the Supreme Court
description: Nohemi Gonzalez was killed during the 2015 Paris terror attacks. Her family sued YouTube for promoting ISIS content. The case could upend the internet.
